attributes.action: Putting key workers on the SARS-CoV-2 priority list for the vaccine.
attributes.background: It's a general concern of the public that sectors of key workers who are being asked to work during the lockdown periods are not being valued and protected enough. There is no mention of putting key workers like police officers, firefighters, teachers, supermarket workers etc on the priority list.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/564466
